docs.snippet: Mr. Trump said of Russia’s president, Vladimir V. Putin, “He’s not going into Ukraine,” then was informed that Russia was already there. “O.K., well, he’s there in a certain way,” Mr. Trump replied....
docs.lead_paragraph: Mr. Trump said of Russia’s president, Vladimir V. Putin, “He’s not going into Ukraine,” then was informed that Russia was already there. “O.K., well, he’s there in a certain way,” Mr. Trump replied.
docs.abstract: Donald Trump gives confused statement of his views of Russian annexation of Crimea in 2014 in interview with George Stephanopoulos on news program This Week; says Russian Pres Vladimir V Putin would not direct his forces to go into Ukraine if he becomes president, and offers fractured response to Stephanopoulos when it is pointed out Russian troops have been in Ukraine for two years.

headline.main: Donald Trump Gives Questionable Explanation of Events in Ukraine
headline.print_headline: Trump Tripped Up on Ukraine and Putin

byline.original: By DAVID E. SANGER and MAGGIE HABERMAN

docs.snippet: He found himself navigating the charged history and sensitivities of the same African-American community he had embraced in his private life....
docs.lead_paragraph: He found himself navigating the charged history and sensitivities of the same African-American community he had embraced in his private life.
docs.abstract: Efforts by Democratic vice presidential nominee Sen Tim Kaine, during his tenure as mayor of Richmond, Va, to heal city's historic racial divisions drew mixed reactions; Kaine's immersion in black community's institutions and concerns was sometimes undermined by controversial policies that came out of his efforts to remain a centrist aiming for compromise rather than fighting for radical change.

headline.main: Tim Kaine Recalled for Commitment to Richmond’s African-Americans
headline.print_headline: With Slips and Strides as Mayor, Kaine Tried to Heal Racial Divide

docs.snippet: Mr. Trump faced criticism from Democrats and Republicans over his rough and racially charged dismissal of Khizr and Ghazala Khan, who appeared at the Democratic convention....
docs.lead_paragraph: Mr. Trump faced criticism from Democrats and Republicans over his rough and racially charged dismissal of Khizr and Ghazala Khan, who appeared at the Democratic convention.
docs.abstract: Donald J Trump draws intense criticism from both fellow Republicans and Democratic leaders after he ridicules appearance of Khizr and Ghazala Khan, Muslim Americans who lost their son during military service in Iraq, at Democratic National Convention; Trump is seeing no empathy for his claims on Twitter that Khizr Khan viciously attacked him, and episode may prove to be one of biggest crises of his presidential campaign to date.

headline.main: Donald Trump’s Confrontation With Muslim Soldier’s Parents Emerges as Unexpected Flash Point
